name: Air dancer officer
description:
This is a small game made with a team of 3 people over the course of a few hours. The idea was to experiment with a funny theme, themed mechanics and non typical controls.

"You are an air dancer officer and you have to control the traffic and prevent the people from being ran over by blowing/talking on the mic"

Maria Ayelen Garcia @arteAyuGarcia
Leandro Camugli
Federico Jose de Tezanos Pinto @FedericoDETP


Music: we dont own the music, it was made by Teknoaxe @teknoaxe
